title: Johan：0.10.0 Beta版将在数小时内发布
author: kaho
txt_content:
jbernhardsson：The beta should be up in a few hours, uploaded within the hour. If you have any issues, please post a screenshot to the group. :)
jbernhardsson：Beta版本将在数小时内发布。如果你有任何问题，请连同截图发到群组里。:)
